resources.string: Tethermote requires Write Settings permission to control WiFi tethering. Please enabled it on system settings screen.

Device can be too far for Bluetooth or its Bluetooth is disabled or device is turned off.\nIf device is near by but still does not work try to run Tethermote Settings on that device again.\nIf you are using nonstandard powersaving system or your device is Samsung or HTC, which is using nonstandard powersaving system, add this application as exclusion.
Tethermote requires Write Settings permission. Please open settings and give that permission.
This device does not support WiFi tethering with WiFi enabled. Disabling WiFi.
Allow switching this device WiFi tethering.
Disable WiFi connection if device does not support WiFi tethering in the same time.
Disable remote tethering when this device screen turns off.
Enable remote tethering when this device screen turns on.
Show ongoing switch notification to switch remote tethering from notification bar.
This device does not support WiFi tethering while WiFi is connected.\nIf you need switching tethering even if WiFi is connected turn \"Disable WiFi\" on.
